description:
NIVEA Crme Soft Caring Soap Bars are enriched with Almond Oil, which has skin care benefits, leaving you feeling pampered after every use. The creme soap creates a rich, creamy foam which cleanses and cares for your skin, leaving them feeling soft, and supple.

NIVEA Crme Soft Care Soap refreshes your skin for a soft and caring feeling. The formula gently cleanses and pampers your skin while its fresh scent leaves it delicately perfumed. With rich Almond Oil, the creamy foam gently cleanses your skin. Simply apply the soap to your wet hands. Then, lather your palms, the back of your hands and between your fingers. Don’t forget your fingernails! Scrub your hands for at least 20 seconds before rinsing the residue off with warm water. Then, pat your hands dry with a clean towel and apply a moisturising hand cream. The skin compatibility of this hand soap has been dermatologically approved.

1Caring Formula: made with NIVEA Crme Soft

2Lasting Nourishment: leaving your skin feeling silky and moisturised

3Quality Ingredients: blended with natural Almond Oil to pamper your skin

4Sweet Fragrance: fresh scent leaves skin delicately perfumed

5Pampering: restores the appearance of dry skin

6Usage: suitable for daily use
name: Nivea Crème Soft Moisturising Soap Bar Value Pack 100g x 2 pack
